_meanings:
{@--1@} The act of depositing
or placing down.

{@--2@} An open 
deposit, any article given in another's
charge by letting him know its form,
quantity &c. <ls>Y. 2. 25</ls>; (on which
<ls>Mit.</ls> says:-- {#upanikzepo nAma#} 
{#rUpasaMKyApradarSanena rakzaRArTaM parasya haste nihitaM dravyaM#}).

{@--3@}
A deposit sealed or covered up (?).
